about.description: An implementation of the Promises/A+ specification and test suite in Python

name: aplus
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "aplus" %}
{% set version = "0.11.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "4f57025413bd9611fb54782b8f46946ea874ae7bb6dd876c0ec45c6a8d60f6e7" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - aplus

about:
  home: https://github.com/xogeny/aplus
  license: MIT
  summary: 'Promises/A+ for Python'
  description: |
    An implementation of the Promises/A+ specification and test suite in Python
  doc_url: https://github.com/xogeny/aplus
  dev_url: https://github.com/xogeny/aplus

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - maartenbreddels
